original_title: Children of the Dirt II Redemption
overview: Road trip with top motocross and freestyle riders in the world and see what they do for fun in their spare time. Ch-ck out demo derbies, hot chicks, 50 ridin' and sand tricks. With a cast of Travis, "Cowboy" Kenny, Cam, Farmboy and the rest of the crew putting everything they can ride or drive to the test - you won't want to miss a minute of the action!
title: Children of the Dirt II Redemption
